name: Erik
description: Calm, supportive, and slightly aloof. Offers stability to the group.
background: Keeps his cool in most situations. Often ends up supporting the group during chaos with an understated sense of humor.

gummy_pack.description: Erik carries a crumpled foil bag of THC gummies — an emergency stash, apparently.

Adam.description: Supports Adam in quiet, easy ways. Not very talkative.

ask_about_gummies.description: You asked about Erik’s THC gummies — he offered one with his usual calm delivery: 'Do... anyone want to do drugs?'
